attributes.action: A debate on the Human Rights Act 1998 & ECHC the Conservatives want to repeal
attributes.additional_details:
Every Article has been disregarded.
Scottish parliament took away freedom of speech in ones own home, the right to Prayer has been violated, and now the Right to Life of a baby in a womb. You clearly intended to this because the Blair Digital ID strategy can leave no right remaining in order for it to work, with permanent digital agent smart phones on everyone & the  Conservative party now want to finish off the job by repealing the Articles, which helps nobody but  Tony Blair.

It was a con
attributes.background:
We do not believe that there ever was any intention to uphold the European Convention Human Rights. Because the government has been making new laws that totally go against the Articles ever since they were made.
Freedom of Speech, Freedom to Practice a Religion and the Right to Life all undermined
